channel.title: Changing the levels of differ staff positions!?
channel.description:
well you see on my server people have been training and training and they getting to lvl 185 to quickly you see.... i dont wanna reset them because i dont wanna upset/lose people from my server... is there like any way so i can make non mod or admin go to 160 cb... mods go to 175 cb and admins 185cb???
PL()X HELP ME!

item.title: Changing the levels of differ staff positions!?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Okay. I havent tested it, or tried it (Same thing -.-), but it just came to the top of my mind. Maybe you can find where the max stat limits are,(There is a tutorial for changing the max stats) put like next to it && (playerRights >= 1 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("x91"))), and keep changing the player rights from 0-3. Then, make a duplicate or the max level and keep putting this beside it. I dont know if it will work, but its worth a try NOT my fault for errors, lol. You do not have to try this. As I said, I didnt even code it in. It was an idea

Read full topic

umm no thats sad, 2 me thta just makes me think u wanna b the best dont post such sadness pls. theres no way u can do this anyway

Anyways… yes it’s possible, very possible & very easy I don’t suggest it. You can just type ::ring and get a pring…[/quote] rofl w.e i can make perfect sense of what im saying. rofl rofl rofl dunno what ur on about.
